transcript: one of the things I thought was genius about like Yogurt Land If you go to a store and then they fill up your stuff behind the counter and then they say hey it's 8 bucks you're like man what the hell this place is so expensive but if they give you the cup and you fill it up and you put it on the scale you're like man I'm a fat ass same pricing but because I had control over what I picked I'm the one who's responsible for the decision
